name: Brain Garden: The brain test
description:
Brain garden is an addictive free brain teaser game with hundreds of puzzles in which you can train your brain to think outside the box. There is no age limit to play this offline tricky puzzle game as you can enjoy this with your friends and family. You will always have to think differently to pass the riddles and puzzles. You can describe this game even as a brain exercise that will beat boredom. This IQ game helps you train your brain to calm and relax and to see things differently.

Brain garden Features:

❌No age limit to play this puzzle game

🔥endless riddles and puzzles

🤔Makes you think differently

😝Unexpected game answers

💪🏻Can even Play offline

Download this fun game for free

Simple and highly addictive game

Spend your leisure time meaningful and with joy.

With graphics that are easy to your eye and mind relaxing music.

TRY Brain Garden FOR FREE!

We are looking forward to getting feedback from all of you! Please leave your reviews, so we can keep making the game even better.

If you like brain games, the Brain Garden puzzle is definitely your favourite! Download and have fun with your friends!

Enjoying Brain Garden? Learn more about us!
